data.comment: The match is underway at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Tokyo pushes forward through Kensuke Nagai, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 9, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick Cerezo.
At Ajinomoto Stadium, Cerezo are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 14, Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 15, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo's Leandro breaks free at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
In the minute 19, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Cerezo.
Tokyo are coming forward and Diego Oliveira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Cerezo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 21, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Tokyo.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 23, Can Cerezo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Tokyo's Tsuyoshi Watanabe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Tokyo throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Cerezo.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 38, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Tokyo are pushing forward but Hirotaka Mita's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 41, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Tokyo throw-in in Cerezo's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Cerezo's Naoyuki Fujita gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 45, At Ajinomoto Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tokyo's Arthur Silva looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Cerezo.
Cerezo needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
The first-half has ended.
Arthur Silva is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Tokyo drives forward and Leandro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 49, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tokyo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cerezo.
In the minute 51, Tokyo are caught offside.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In Tokyo Cerezo attack through Hiroshi Kiyotake. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cerezo push forward at Ajinomoto Stadium and Bruno Pereira Mendes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tokyo defence.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Yusuke Maruhashi for Cerezo drives towards goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 61, Takuya Uchida is on a sub for Hirotaka Mita for Tokyo.
Adailton is replacing Kensuke Nagai for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Cerezo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 63, Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tokyo's half?
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diego Oliveira scores to make it 1-0 at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 65, Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Goal! Adailton extends Tokyo's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 66, Takuya Uchida instrumental with a fine assist.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 73, Shuto Abe (Tokyo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 73, Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's first substitution at Ajinomoto Stadium with Yoichiro Kakitani replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake.
The away team replace Bruno Pereira Mendes with Koji Suzuki.
The away team have replaced Hiroaki Okuno with Toshiyuki Takagi. This is the third substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Tokyo.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Cerezo's area.
In the minute 74, Tokyo's Leandro gets in a shot on goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo's Arthur Silva is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Adailton gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tokyo.
Tatsuhiro Sakamoto of Cerezo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Cerezo.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a fourth substitution, with Eiichi Katayama replacing Yusuke Maruhashi.
The away team have replaced Leandro Desabato with Yasuki Kimoto. This is the fifth substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
In the minute 81, Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Cerezo pushes forward through Koji Suzuki, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 85, Free kick Tokyo.
Taichi Hara is replacing Diego Oliveira for the home team.
Leandro for Tokyo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 86, Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
Yoichiro Kakitani (Cerezo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Cerezo.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Tokyo. The final score is 2-0.
Riku Matsuda (Cerezo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tokyo make their fourth substitution with Kyosuke Tagawa replacing Leandro.
At Ajinomoto Stadium, Masato Morishige has been yellow-carded for the home team.
